name: gosu-chroma-rag-context
description: Vector-DB-agnostic RAG agent tooling for Guidewire Gosu codebases

scripts.ingest:all: npm run ingest:code && npm run ingest:docs
scripts.fix:deps: cd ../gosu-chroma-rag && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm rebuild && cd ../chroma-rag-docs && npm install && npm rebuild && echo '✅ All sibling dependencies fixed'
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf .cache .conversation_history.json && cd ../gosu-chroma-rag && npm run clean-cache && cd ../chroma-rag-docs && npm run clean-cache && echo '✅ Cleaned caches'
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf .cache .conversation_history.json chroma_data && cd ../gosu-chroma-rag && npm run clean-cache && cd ../chroma-rag-docs && npm run clean-cache && echo '✅ Cleaned everything'
